import sys
sys.stdout.reconfigure(encoding=''utf-8'')
import os

# Check the GROQ key loading
from dotenv import load_dotenv
load_dotenv()
key = os.getenv(''GROQ_API_KEY'', ''NOT SET'')
print(f''GROQ_API_KEY loaded: {key[:15]}...'' if key and key != ''NOT SET'' else ''GROQ_API_KEY: NOT SET'')

# Check if groq package is installed
try:
    from groq import Groq
    print(''groq package: Installed'')
except ImportError:
    print(''groq package: NOT INSTALLED'')

# Check langchain-groq
try:
    from langchain_groq import ChatGroq
    print(''langchain-groq package: Installed'')
except ImportError:
    print(''langchain-groq package: NOT INSTALLED'')
")
